title: Gluino-Condensate (CIV-DV) Prepotential from its Whitham-Time Derivatives
abstract: We describe an expedient way to derive the CIV-DV prepotential in power series expansion in S_i. This is based on integrations of equations for its derivatives with respect to additional (Whitham) moduli T_m. For illustrative purposes, we calculate explicitly the leading terms of the expansion and explicitly check some components of the WDVV equations to the leading order. Extension to any higher order is simple and algorithmic.
